rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 20 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 6:45 AM, 15 July 2025(Tuesday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Batangas, Zambales, Metro Manila, Bulacan and Pampanga within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Quezon(San Francisco, San Andres), Cavite(Maragondon, Ternate, Tanza, Naic, Trece Martires) and Bataan(Mariveles, Bagac) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
